## sliceTable() function

Safely applies slicing args to a table

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare function sliceTable(table: ColumnTable, offset: number, limit: number): ColumnTable;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  table | ColumnTable | the input table |
|  offset | number | the row offset |
|  limit | number | the row limit |

<b>Returns:</b>

ColumnTable
